Category: Andover | Tony Guntharp <<<<<<< HEAD 2014-02-20T16:02:06-08:00 http://fusion94.org/ ======= 2014-02-19T18:16:52-08:00 http://fusion94.org// >>>>>>> d5ed64a890e2f4c868694ef817d610a6bdc47f16 fusion94 fusion94@gmail.com Octopress VA Linux purchases Andover.Net <<<<<<< HEAD 2000-02-03T11:24:00-08:00 http://fusion94.org/blog/2000/02/03/va-linux-purchases-andover-net ======= 2000-02-03T11:24:00-08:00 http://fusion94.org//blog/2000/02/03/va-linux-purchases-andover-net >>>>>>> d5ed64a890e2f4c868694ef817d610a6bdc47f16

Well here I am at LinuxWorld Conference and Expo (LWCE) here in New York City and the news just broke that my employer, VA Linux Systemsa has just purchased Andover.Net.

So what does this mean? Honestly…I have no idea other than what the above statement says. I know of no plans to merger Server51 with SourceForge. Nor is SourceForge planning to merge with Freshmeat or Slashdot.

So don’t ask me.
